_description: Configuration for wastewater-based epidemic surveillance with three key features: RNA load, detected cases by area, and detection ratio estimation

sewershed_configuration._comment: Sewersheds are created by grouping wards. Adjust based on your city's infrastructure

sampling_parameters._comment: 3 samples per week is typical for surveillance (Mon, Wed, Fri)
Seasonal dilution due to rainfall. 1.0 = dry season, >1.0 = wet season

viral_shedding_model._comment: Days after infection when viral shedding peaks (typically 5-7 days)
Peak viral RNA copies shed per person per day (1 billion copies)
Standard deviation controlling width of shedding curve
Total days of viral shedding (longer than infectiousness period)
Asymptomatic cases shed 60% of symptomatic levels
Shedding begins during late exposed phase
Minimum detectable RNA concentration in wastewater (lab-dependent)

detection_ratio_estimation._comment: Calibration factor: converts viral concentration (copies/L) to estimated infections per 100k. Requires calibration with local data
Minimum active infections needed for reliable wastewater signal
Wastewater detects outbreaks 4-7 days before clinical symptoms appear

notes.feature_1_rna_load: Calculates total viral load (copies) and concentration (copies/L) in wastewater for each sewershed
notes.feature_2_detected_cases: Aggregates clinical surveillance data (detected cases, hospitalizations, deaths) by sewershed area
notes.feature_3_detection_ratio: Estimates true infections from wastewater signal and calculates detection_ratio = detected/true to quantify underreporting
notes.calibration_notes: The viral_load_to_infection_factor should be calibrated using historical data where both wastewater measurements and case counts are available. Typical range: 1e-7 to 1e-5

interpretation.detection_ratio_0.8: 80% of infections are detected by clinical surveillance (good coverage)
interpretation.detection_ratio_0.3: 30% detection means 70% of infections are missed
interpretation.underreporting_factor_3.0: For every 1 detected case, there are 3 true infections
